# bidiProcessingEnabled

**Instance Property**

Returns whether bidirectional text processing is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
var bidiProcessingEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if bidirectional text processing is enabled, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] otherwise.
title: bidiProcessingEnabled
